post:
I've got 4 Kidechires from Online.net that i outgrown heavily now, so i will outsource to whom needs it instead of "dropping out through window" and i will switch to Dedibox XC instead.

Server specifications can be found here:

http://www.online.net/en/dedicated-server/dedibox-kidechire

Every server included the 100GB FTP backup service aswell.

Asking price is 12.9 EUR/quarter payed through Paypal only.

A valid Online.net account is a must.

TERMS:

Read and respect Online.net's TOS

http://www.online.net/cgv-en.pdf

http://www.online.net/cgv-dedie-en.pdf

**Failure to adhere to Online.net's TOS will result in immediate termination and revoke of server without any kind of refund from me.**
